body_html: @SsnL Yep it does! Actually the tricky part is, if users use nn.Upsample for downsampling, that still works. Since it calls F.interpolate inside nn.Upsample :P So they don't have to use F.interpolate despite the misleading name.
body_text: @SsnL Yep it does! Actually the tricky part is, if users use nn.Upsample for downsampling, that still works. Since it  calls F.interpolate inside nn.Upsample :P So they don't have to use F.interpolate despite the misleading name.
body: @SsnL Yep it does! Actually the tricky part is, if users use nn.Upsample for downsampling, that still works. Since it  calls F.interpolate inside nn.Upsample :P So they don't have to use F.interpolate despite the misleading name.
